name: Investigate Suspicious Email
description: Investigates an alert of type ‘Suspicious Email’, and escalates the alert to an ‘Incident’ if indicators associated with the alert are found to be ‘Malicious’.

message.content:
Investigation Summary:

  • No malicious indicators found
  • No  attempt of spoofing
  • No  blacklisted keywords found
  • Alert severity updated to  Low due to non malicious content

resource.content:
Request to block indicators is  Approved

Proceeding with block procedure

message.content: Malicious content found , tagging alert as Phishing.

resource.content:
{% if vars.foundList | length != 0 %}

 Suspicious keyword matched

 

Matched keywords:

{{vars.foundList | join(' , ')}}

{% else %}

No keywords matched

{% endif %}

schema.title: Approval - Block Malicious Indicators
schema.description:
Please approve blocking of malicious indicators:-

{% for i in vars.malicious_IndicaorList %}

{{i[0]}} :: {{i[1]}}

{%endfor%}

schema.title: Investigate False Positive Email Alert
schema.description: Email alert do not contain any known malicious content and its not a spoofing attempt. Do you still want to continue investigation?

arguments.SPF_Record: {% set headers =  vars.input.records[0].emailHeaders | toDict %}{% if headers.header['received-spf'] -%}{{headers.header['received-spf']}}{% elif headers['received-spf'] -%}{{headers['received-spf']}}{%- endif %}

resource.content: Request to block indicators is denied

arguments.__dummy: {%for item in vars.SuspiciousData if item in vars.emailbody %} {{vars.foundList.append(item)}} {%endfor%}

message.content: Sender email address '{{vars.sender_email_address}}' do not match Return Path '{{vars.sender_return_path}}'. Tagging alert as Spoofing.

arguments.Not_Permitted_IPs: {% for var in vars.SPF_Record if vars.SPF_Record %}{{ (var | regex_search('(?<=client-ip=)([\S]*)(?=;)') )  if  (var | regex_search('(?<=fail)([^,]+)(?i)'))}}{%endfor%}

resource.content:
{% if vars.SPF_Record | length == 0 %}
SPF Check Failed -No Records Found.

{% elif vars.Not_Permitted_IPs -%}

SPF check failed due to non permitted IP(s)


{% for ip in [vars.Not_Permitted_IPs] -%} IP : {{ ip }} {%endfor%}

{% else -%}

SPF Check Passed

{% endif %}

message.content: Acknowledge receipt of a suspicious email with the following subject "{{vars.input.records[0].emailSubject}}" is sent to the sender '{{vars.sender_email_address}}'

resource.body: We acknowledge the receipt of a suspicious email with the following subject "{{vars.input.records[0].emailSubject}}".
resource.subject: Thank you for your submission

message.content: Response email with the following subject "{{vars.result.subject}}" is sent to the sender '{{vars.sender_email_address}}'.

resource.body:
Hello,

We are reaching out to you regarding your email.subject "{{vars.input.records[0].emailSubject}}" Based on the information and email provided, we determined that this is a Phishing Type email and it is Suspicious.
If you see another email with the same characteristics, please forward the suspicious email to infosec@example.com and delete it from your mailbox.

We appreciate your diligence in being cautious, and we thank you for bringing this to our attention.
resource.subject: Response to the Phishing Email

message.content:
Tagging alert as Potential  DriveByDownloadAttack.

 

{%for i in vars.steps.Check_for_Drive_by_Download %}

URL: {{i.URL}}
Summary: {{i.Summary}}

{%endfor%}

schema.title: Mark as Drive by Download?

routes.name: Check Blacklisted Keywords -> Add note for Blacklisted Words
Add note for Suspicious Words -> Approval to Block Malicious Indicators
Add Spoofing Tag -> Copy  of Find Malicious Indicators
Continue If Malicious Content -> Continue
routes.label: Investigate

routes.name: Investigate False Positive -> Set Severity
routes.label: No

routes.name: Start -> Configuration
Request Approved -> Block Malicious URL
Approval to Block Malicious Indicators -> Request Denied
routes.label: No

routes.name: Continue If Malicious Content -> Investigate False Positive
routes.label: Suggest Closure

routes.name: Request Denied -> Add Phishing Tag
Block Malicious URL -> Add Phishing Tag
Approval to Block Malicious Indicators -> Request Approved
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Investigate False Positive -> Continue
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Get Non Permitted IP -> Add note for SPF Records
Add note for SPF Records -> Add Spoofing Tag
Start Investigation -> Get Non Permitted IP
Configuration -> Reply to Sender
Reply to Sender -> Start Investigation
Add Phishing Tag -> Copy  of Reply to Sender
Add Drive By Download Tag -> Continue If Malicious Content
Find Related Malicious Indicators -> Copy  of Find Related Malicious Indicators
Get URL Indicators -> Check for Drive by Download
Check for Drive by Download -> mark drive by download
mark drive by download -> Add Drive By Download Tag
routes.label: Mark Drive By Download

routes.name: Copy  of Add Drive By Download Tag -> Continue If Malicious Content
Mark Drive by Download -> Copy  of Add Drive By Download Tag
routes.label: Do Not Mark
